name: Laika (ShootingShark, elleven, Leevani)
description:
Description:
Survival game set in an alternate universe where the first dog in space, Laika, who was sent to space survived on an cold remote planet. Melt the ice & reveal the resources needed to help the Laika and her comrades survive in this harsh environment. Dogs need plenty of food & warmth to survive.

Team name:
Pupper's Delight

Controls:
Left Mouse Button: Contextual UI. Used to build structures or interact with buttons/props in the world
Middle Mouse Button: Pan camera
Right Mouse Button: Rotate camera
H: Thermal vision

List of any content that was created for this:
Audio
- Audio was downloaded from ZapSplat
ContentExamples
- Blueprints Examples

- Particle Effects

Unreal marketplace:
- MegaGameMusicCollection (for music)
- Pro Sound Collection (most sfx)
- LandscapeMountains

Quixel Megascans: 
- Decals, surfaces (snow), rock meshes and plants
